text: Pierre Balmain S.A. (), also known as Balmain, is a French luxury fashion house. It was founded by Pierre Balmain in 1945. It has over 50 stores. Its main store is located on Rue Saint-Honor√© in Paris. They also have stores in Tokyo, New York City, London, and in Milano. ==References== Category:1945 establishments in France Category:French fashion houses Category:Companies based in Paris
title: Balmain (fashion house)
